subject: Attn; ,
body:
Attn; ,
Based on our investigation of your payment, we want to find out if you're still alive or did you sign any deed of assignment with (Mrs. Sarah Johnson.) to receive your fund, reply to us with:
Your Names:....................
Your Home/Office Address:......
Your Phone Number:.............
Mobile Number:.................
Your Occupation:...............
Your Age/Sex:..................
Direct Email Address.............
Regards,
Liam Jacob.

subject: Re:   Attn; ,
body:
Hello Liam Jacob,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your concern about my payment and the need to verify my status.

However, before I provide any personal information, could you please clarify a few things for me? Firstly, what payment are you referring to? Secondly, who is Mrs. Sarah Johnson and why would I have signed a deed of assignment with her?

Once I have a better understanding of the situation, I will be happy to assist you further. Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Elizabeth

subject: Re: Attn; ,
body:
INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND (IMF).
DEPT: WORLD DEBT RECONCILIATION AGENCIES.
ADVISE: YOUR OUTSTANDING PAYMENT NOTIFICATION.

Attention: Harendra Dave,

Thanks for your response.

However,I acknowledge the receipt of your message which all you stated we
noted and well understood also i will like to answer your questions.

1.Why i contacted you for this payment is because your first name and email
address is in our contact that was why you were contacted.

2.Mrs Sarah Johnson is someone who claimed to be you and contacted us that
this funds belongs to her that you sent her to claim the funds which is the
sum of $7.5M on your behalf .

3.I wouldn't have known if you signed any deed with her. That is the reason
we have to write you via email if you did so.

In your interest let me hear from you as soon as possible.

Yours Sincerely,
Mr. Liam Jacob.
International Monetary Fund.



+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++YOUR RESPOSE++++++++++++++++++++++++

subject: Re: Attn; ,
body:
Dear Mr. Liam Jacob,

Thank you for your prompt response. I appreciate you taking the time to address my questions. I must admit, I am a bit confused about the situation you mentioned regarding Sarah Johnson claiming that the funds belong to her. I have never heard of this person before and I certainly did not send her to claim any funds on my behalf.

Could you please provide more details about how she contacted you and what information she provided? It is important for me to understand the full picture before taking any further action.

Also, could you clarify what deed you are referring to? I don't recall signing any deed with anyone recently, so it would be helpful if you could explain further.

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Elizabeth

subject: Re: Attn; ,
body:
Dear Mr. Liam Jacob,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your prompt response and the information you have provided regarding the unpaid contract deeds with foreign countries. It sounds like a complex situation, and I understand the importance of ensuring that every family involved receives their funds.

Could you please provide more details about how this process works? How can I assist in making sure that these families receive their payments? Is there any specific information or documentation that is required from my end?

I look forward to hearing back from you soon.

Best wishes,
Elizabeth

body:
